reviews.text: We are 3 brothers with partners and privledged to be the first guests at this fabulous guest house. We took all 3 rooms over the new year period 07 08 so had the whole house to ourselves. Rooms are very elegantly decorated and there was no best room as each had it's unique qualities. The atmosphere is relaxed , serene and gives one an appreciation of what it's like to live in one of those homes you see in magazines. We had a brillant time at the thoughtful hands of the excellent hosts Jacques and Joel who made us feel very welcome. Can't wait to get back but this time in the summer to take advantage of the garden. Easily walking distance to everywhere - stay there you will not be disappointed. Thanks J&J from some very satisfied customers
reviews.title: First guests - Fab

reviews.text: Although I use this site extensively when reviewing my travel plans I have never felt the need to add a review, until now. My husband and I took my parents to Bruges for a two day trip on their three week trip to Europe and stayed two nights in the de Triptiek B & B. We had a fabulous time mainly because of the wonderful hosts of the De Triptiek. We have traveled all over Europe and have never had such a pleasant stay. The B & B is wonderfully decorated and just laden with luxuries to make you feel special. Chocolates from Stephan Dumon's are on the pillows and special bath products are simply one more reason to want a long soak in their elegantly redecorated bathrooms! Although it was quite chilly while we were there, every night we came into a welcome fire in the fireplace downstairs and soft classical music playing in the background. While waiting for my mother to finish getting ready for our dinners I had the opportunity to peruse the hosts' library collection, which covered just about every subject. The icing on the cake were the hosts themselves however. Our breakfasts were scrumptious and full of warm laughter as they beguiled us with charming stories about the local area. Since our trip was on Valentines day they made reservations at their favorite restaurant and we enjoyed the best seafood meal we have had in Europe, in the last five years. Enjoying Bruges was really just an added pleasantry to the whole experience. Needless to say we highly recommend this B & B and will be going back there again as soon as we can!!!
reviews.title: Fabulous B & B!!!!

likes.liked: — The hosts and the beautiful decor.

reviews.title: Loved De Triptiek
reviews.text: We are from Switzerland and recently stayed at this newly opened B&B and felt we just had to tell people about it. De Triptiek is a beautifully renovated (understated elegance) old house with a charming walled garden where we could just picture ourselves having our breakfast if it had been in summer. Our room overlooking the garden was spacious, light and airy with a large comfortable bed and crisp white bedding; breakfast was delicious and copious and we had a hard time not to overeat! But what really made it special for us were our French hosts (who fell in love with the city and decided to set up home there); they couldn’t have been more charming and helpful and bent over backwards to make our stay in Bruges memorable – we felt like guests in a comfortable family home.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: De Triptiek provided us with one of the most relaxing and beautiful long weekends for many many years. The quality of the rooms was absolutely outstanding with careful consideration given to the creature comforts such as power-showers, soft furnishings and tasteful decoration. The owner, Joël is a charming host who was on hand to offer helpful advice about Brugge, sumptuous breakfasts and was only too happy to book restaurants for us in the evening. Joël has personally overseen the renovation work on this gorgeous typical step-gabled Brugge house and the result has been exceptional. There is a living room for guests to use that is to die for - with beautiful antique portraits, gorgeous antique furniture and a lovely crackling fire lit in the fireplace! Two of the three rooms have wonderful views of the gorgeous garden that is tended by Joël. I saw it in winter and was so impressed I can't wait to come back in the summer to see the cherry tree in full bloom!! The B&B location is also brilliant - a short walk from Minnewater Park, the Begijnhof (nunnery) and the Church of Our Lady.
reviews.title: De Triptiek - exquisite new boutique B&B in the centre of Brugge

reviews.text: This is a great place -- cozy fireplace, lovely garden, quiet, fantastically furnished, amazing breakfast and warm hospitality from Joel and Jacques. The bed was comfy and the bathroom amazing with separate rain shower, lovely colours throughout. Will definitely be back! Really, no down side.
reviews.title: Fantastic!

likes.liked: — rooms, coziness, breakfast, helpfulness getting concert tickets

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: De Triptiek deserves a true recommendation! After having read several reviews on this website, my partner and I decided to stay at De Triptiek for 3 nights. > It is a very beautiful and romantically decorated B&B. The originally French owners/hosts, Joel and Jacques, are very hospitable and kind. The decoration of the rooms (we were in the 'smallest', chambre noix, which also was very luxurious) was very beautiful, definitely one you see in magazines. > We were the first ones who could have a great breakfast in the quiet garden. But especially the hospitality and warmth with which the two gentlemen run this B&B makes you feel very welcome and makes your trip to Bruges more memorable. They have great taste for design, know some good places to go to in Bruges, and give you a luxurious weekend with a personal touch.> If you plan to go to Bruges and you are looking for a place to stay in the city centre, you will definitely like De Triptiek.
reviews.title: Beautiful and warm B&B

likes.liked: — Decoration/design of interior, hosts are very friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I went to Bruges for our first year wedding anniversary in April. What really made the experience of Bruges so excellent was staying at De Triptiek. To start with, the taste and standard in which it has been done up is completely luxurious, beautiful and interesting. You could not find a room more comfortable or relaxing and with the added bonus of having delicious Belgium Chocolates on the bed and a delicious breakfast to start the day. The owners are truly charming people and will go out of their way to help you and answer any questions you have. We went to the best antique, interior shops and finest restaurants in town and really all in all had one of the most enjoyable weekend trips. This is definately the place to stay - an experience in itself.
reviews.title: COMPLETELY PERFECT

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner & I recently had the pleasure of staying at this truly remarkable small luxury bed & breakfast. We had been trying to visit Brugge for years but the timing just never quite worked out. As we began planning this trip, we were hoping to finally stay at Number 11(which I had eagerly read about for years), but as fate would have it, they were all booked up. Annie - the kind and wonderful owner of Number 11, gently encouraged us to try Die Triptiek - a relatively new option in Brugge owned by good friends of hers. Given the rave reviews of Number 11, we had very high expectations for anything that Annie would suggest and I am pleased to write that the Brugge bed & breakfast scene has another magnificent gem for lodging in this lovely town.
reviews.title: Elegant Luxury served with Warmth and Kindess

likes.disliked: — That I could not transport the entire inn back to Los Angeles to live in!

reviews.title: Absolutely charming!
reviews.text: From the moment we stepped in the door at Die Triptiek, we felt that we had discovered a hidden treasure of sublime luxury and comfort. The owners, Jacques and Joel have truly created a haven that perfectly combines tasteful luxury with the most sincere warmth and attentive service. The common rooms of the inn exude an ultra chic Flemish style and are most welcoming and comfortable.
